Running story UserAuthentication.story
(UserAuthentication.story) Narrative: In order to access the AC Superstars Application As a n employee I want to authenticate into the system Scenario: Valid authentication for an user Given I am on SignInPage When I authenticate using default_username and default_password Then I should be on HomePage
